byline.contributor: Khalid Alokozay and Fahim Abed contributed reporting.

abstract: Afghan police chief Gen Zarawar Zahid is killed in bombing in Nangarhar Province, which has been under threat from Taliban and affiliates of Islamic State; Taliban claims responsibility.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The police chief, Gen. Zarawar Zahid, was visiting an outpost when explosives detonated. The Taliban claimed responsibility for his death.
snippet: The police chief, Gen. Zarawar Zahid, was visiting an outpost when explosives detonated. The Taliban claimed responsibility for his death....

headline.main: Afghan Police Chief Is Killed as He Tries to Turn Tide Against Taliban
headline.print_headline: Blast Kills Afghan Police Chief Who Tried to Turn Tide Against the Taliban
